file_content.text: Mako, run this data.
All right, just one sec. Okay, I've updated our astrogation computer. This is a pretty obscure system.
Mako want Blizz have a look? Blizz see things very good.
Thanks, Blizz. I think I've got it.
Last I'd heard Belsavis wasn't even worth colonizing. The Imperials have it designated as a Republic prison world, though.
We'll find out more when we see it ourselves.
Directions will have to do.
I'll keep an ear to the ground, just in case.
I like a sense of mystery and excitement.
Shouldn't be boring, at least.
That's something I like about you, even if your taste is a little questionable.
Poke around; I'm not in any hurry to visit yet.
You've got time for research.
I'll see what I can dig up, but I'm not optimistic.
Strangely, I think he's on the level. The guy doesn't exactly scream subterfuge.
Was it this easy last time? I can't remember.
The only way they're getting in here is if they blow the doors.
Guess it's too late to say sorry, huh?
We're coming out of hyperspace. Everyone up front.
There's the fleet. I hope you're right about this....
Look on the bright side. They open fire, and we'll be breaking the galactic record for going from zero to space dust.
Battle stations?
Wouldn't even scratch the paint on those cruisers.
No point.
Point taken.
Warm up the turrets. Keep the targeting computers on standby.
Be ready, but not threatening.
Charging to full.
Blizz, shields.
Ooh, Blizz get to try new modifications to system.
We get work done on the shields recently?
Did we upgrade them?
No, I'm pretty sure we haven't.
If you've busted something, I swear....
They better still work, rat!
Blizz not bust anything!
Blizz make lots of improvements to boss's ship.
Make thermostat work right, add step stool to refresher and sink, retune shield emitters. Lots of stuff!
Don't touch anything else without my say-so.
We'll discuss this later.
Handy little devil, ain't he?
All that, huh? Thanks.
Touch anything else, and I'm tossing you out the nearest air lock, got it?
Quit tampering with my ship!
Hail the flagship.
Mako, contact the fleet.
You know this is probably a trap.
They try anything, we're going to get real up close and personal.
Gear up for boarding.
I like it.
Probably a good idea.
Even if they don't shoot us down, handing us over to the Republic would probably help deflect the flak they've been getting.
I'm aware of the predicament, Mako.
I know.
Just let me be worried, somebody's got to be.
I doubt the Empire's interested in doing the Republic any favors.
Seems unlikely.
I guess, but they're putting up appearances for some reason. Better not take any chances.
I'd like to see them try.
Doesn't mean they won't try.
Hailing... they're transmitting a flight path. We're to dock in hangar eight.
I'm taking us in. Be ready for anything.
Prepare for landing.
They aren't shooting at us... so far so good.
Here goes nothing.
Well, we're committed now....
Hail them again. I want to know what this is about.
Get someone on the comm.
Not getting any response.
Target lock.
And tractor beamed, again.
Guess we're talking on their terms.
Let's just see what they're up to.
Humor them.
They'll be lucky if I don't let my blaster do the talking.
They're starting to upset me.
I'll show them who's calling the shots here.
Like hell.
Ugh, the calm before the storm's the worst.
I've got my fingers crossed. We don't need anymore trouble.
